document.full_text: goaltender ray emery of the anaheim ducks, forwards daymond langkow of the calgary flames and ian laperriere of the philadelphia flyers are the finalists for the bill masterton memorial trophy for perseverance, the national hockey league (nhl) said on tuesday.
document.title: emery, langkow and laperriere finalists for masterton
lines_and_colors: goaltender ray emery of the anaheim ducks, forwards daymond langkow of the calgary flames and ian laperriere of the philadelphia flyers are the finalists for the bill masterton memorial trophy for perseverance, the national hockey league (nhl) said on tuesday.
